Zero mission Am2r Fusion Super Again like many. I love all of these. But I'm going by gameplay feel. Zero mission has the tightest, and intuitive control scheme. Am2r borrows a LOT from zero missions asthetics I love the atmosphere and difficulty of fusion but it does feel a little stiff and slow comparatively. Also. Fusion was my first Super is amazing but I fight with the controller constantly. It's annoying to have to cycle through my items to get to the super missiles or grapple beam.

I was literally just thinking about this. Httydragon 1 is a story about a boy and his pet. Finding his place in the world, earning acceptance from his family (if you count the village as his extended family) and knowing when you were wrong Dragon 2 is so much heavier of a story. It's a story about ruiniting with lost loved ones, losing loved ones, dealing with forces that go against what you believe in, stepping up to lead, it's kind of lion king esque. At the end of the day if I had to pick one that I'd rather sit down and watch to enjoy. It's 1. But 2 is so much deeper and advanced of a story. And then 3 is.... Ehhh I have problems with 3
I just played through again recently and it STILL holds up! Such a good game. Now I'm going to go through prime 2 soon.

I hate being the center of attention and on a date it's just you two. I'm better as a third wheel. But anyway. Yeah I get hardcore crushes. But I don't ever want to take it further than that.

Unseen Depths is amazing! You can get really powerful attacks for 1-2 energies. Don't be shy about discarding cards. Ambipom does up to 120, 60 for each card discarded. Golduck returns and energy to your hand and if you combo this with Draw Energy you get an extra card each turn. Kyogre returns energies from the discard and Empoleon lets you do 80 for 1 energy. The deck is evenly balanced. Black And White decks seemed really unbalanced to me but these ones rock! The only thing I don't love is the trainer selection, but they are servicable.

I'm having a hard time finding synergy amung the cards I pulled. There's not a lot of quick aggro affect, a lot of it is based on "this thing does this thing but only if this thing is tapped and then put a counter on this thing but then do this thing instead" like, it's just too much. Cycling is not fun. I want to play cards, not cycle them. You spend mana to cycle a card so now you don't have the mana to play the card you pulled anyway. Mutate idk if I'm just not doing it right but either it's too slow to pull off succesfully or the mutate effects just really don't play well. I'm just not loving this set like I did with Eldraine and Theros

WRITING.TITLE: Deck Lists
WRITING.TEXT: Okay. my recent obsession is to orgaize cards by their type, and not focus on color since many of my decks have multple colors anyway. But keeping the text color coded like this just makes it easier to find what cards I need. I do prefer seperating Creatures from Non-Creatures when thinking of a deck. Any thoughts? #8203; https://preview.redd.it/343ll1lobb351.png?width=2880 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=2ef20c6f6550620ecf58e8fc4c40725c82512b3b #8203;

WRITING.TITLE: Mill Deck Success!
WRITING.TEXT: I'm so excited, I've been trying so hard to make my mill deck work and I actualy milled someone to death! I can't believe how good it felt to successfuly do that.

I'm still tweaking it so it will change but this is essentially what I'm using. (Arena Standard) Deck 5 Swamp (UND) 92 4 Merfolk Secretkeeper (ELD) 53 7 Island (UND) 90 3 Wall of Lost Thoughts (RNA) 59 5 Plains (UND) 88 2 Orzhov Guildgate (RNA) 253 2 Kaya, Bane of the Dead (WAR) 231 2 Kaya's Wrath (RNA) 187 2 Ashiok, Nightmare Muse (THB) 208 4 Ashiok, Dream Render (WAR) 228 2 Kaya, Orzhov Usurper (RNA) 186 3 Drowned Secrets (GRN) 39 4 Jace, Wielder of Mysteries (WAR) 54 4 Essence Scatter (IKO) 49 2 Dimir Guildgate (GRN) 246 1 Temple of Enlightenment (THB) 246 4 Pacifism (M20) 32 4 Banishing Light (THB) 4 Basically the idea is to control their side of the field with Pacifist type cards while silently milling them. I got the idea Kaya's ultimate to deal damage for each card in their exile. I haven't gotten to use it yet but that's why it's W/U/B. This could easily work as just a W/U too. Kaya doesn't really need to be here.

Deck 4 Swamp (UND) 92 4 Merfolk Secretkeeper (ELD) 53 6 Island (UND) 90 3 Wall of Lost Thoughts (RNA) 59 6 Plains (UND) 88 3 Evolving Wilds (M20) 246 2 Kaya's Wrath (RNA) 187 2 Ashiok, Nightmare Muse (THB) 208 4 Ashiok, Dream Render (WAR) 228 4 Banishing Light (THB) 4 3 Drowned Secrets (GRN) 39 3 Jace, Wielder of Mysteries (WAR) 54 3 Murder (M20) 109 4 Pacifism (M20) 32 3 Lawmage's Binding (RNA) 190 1 Time Wipe (WAR) 223 1 Temple of Enlightenment (THB) 246 1 Hallowed Fountain (RNA) 251 2 Watery Grave (GRN) 259 1 Godless Shrine (RNA) 248 Here's the updated one. It's been way more successful. I could never get Kaya to ultimate so I pretty much just took the kaya's out. Also the other kaya card was a 6 mana to exile a creature, kinda too late in the game to be useful. But Ashiok has been doing wonders.
I will definitely give this a shot. Thanks for the tips! (I do find the shock lands useful but they are like $10 each. Would the scry lands be suitable substitutes?)
For some reason I'm hearing Sophoroth's Theme
Is there anyway to destroy enchantments without targetting them? Like a #8220;destroy all enchantments #8221; card

Like atmospheric pleasure, I guess. but idk. There was nothing sexual going on. She wasn't nude. We weren't into each other. But just that moment was enough to get my off. I don't understand. I try to engage because i have a deep need to please my lover. But i dont get anything personally out of it. So if she doesnt want to im actually relieved to not do it.) and being next to her masturbating really turns me on more than actually having sex.

Got it out of our system and now we are both perfectly content with masturbation.

I think this happened because im so used to looking for something sexually arousing. But then theres this image of a girl that is completely not sexual. Just her sitting on a step. Smoking. WRITING.TITLE: Bit of a rant on two different topics.
WRITING.TEXT: Topic 1. Wow elementals are really over powered in the current meta. Like. When they die it's good, there's a creature that can bring back elementals from the graveyard attacking for that combat, there's elementals ramp. Just... It's too good. Topic 2. Players that can easily over power you but keep going for, whatever reason. Maybe they wanted to kill you in a specific way but haven't met that win condition yet. Like. just hit me with everything you have and get it over with. All my mana is tapped, I have no hand. Just kill me already -.-
Idk but that is an awesome computer background!

Because it was still a fun game. I was impressed by their deck and at least give them to satisfaction of killing me. I feel like when i just forfeit I #8217;m robbing them of getting to see their cool combo pay off

WRITING.TITLE: Standard Izzet W/ Counters
WRITING.TEXT: I used to hate counter spells but I learned recently that they are almost necesary to keep my deck alive. Also, given that my deck has a lot of flyers, cards like Winged Words and Gust of Wind work a lot better than Radical Idea or Unsummon. Lava Coil and Shocks are still great removals especially in early game. Crackling Drake is great late in game when you already have a bunch of inst/sorc in your graveyard and Niv-Mizzet is just a great powerful 5/5 flyer that benefits from drawing cards and playing spells. The only downside is that especially late in the game, Niv Mizzet is really easy to remove. That's where Keep Safe is great for. I would Sideboard keep safe with Negate but Essense Scatter is almost always useful. Spectral Sailor is just a cheap i mana 1/1 flyer that you can cast out early, gives Winged Words and Gust of Wind a cheaper mana cost, and is great for drawing cards later in the game. It does cost 4 but you don't have to tap it. Having 2 Izzet Lockets is pretty good. 3 is a bit much I learned. Other than that, I'm not totally loving Cloudkin seer, If it's defense was higher it would be more useful but 3 mana for a 2/1 flying to draw a card is a bit meh. #8203; "Spark of Genius" 3 Shock (M20) 160 4 Swiftwater Cliffs (M20) 252 9 Mountain (UND) 94 3 Crackling Drake (GRN) 163 11 Island (UND) 90 3 Opt (ELD) 59 4 Sprite Dragon (IKO) 211 2 Niv-Mizzet, Parun (GRN) 192 2 Gust of Wind (IKO) 54 2 Cloudkin Seer (M20) 54 2 Izzet Locket (GRN) 238 2 Radical Idea (GRN) 52 2 Lava Coil (GRN) 108 2 Essence Scatter (IKO) 49 2 Winged Words (M20) 80 2 Beacon Bolt (GRN) 154 2 Keep Safe (IKO) 56 3 Spectral Sailor (M20) 76

WRITING.TITLE: Off my game
WRITING.TEXT: Do you ever have a night where whatever deck you play or cards you 'sideboard' in you can't seem to make it work? I saw someone play a working satyr deck so I thought I would rebuild my satyr deck and it didn't work out as well for me as it did for them. And then my Divine Angels deck. I can never get my Divine Visitation out quick enough to out-power my opponent. Then my black/white cat/vampire deck is really hit or miss. I can never get the combo pieces to perform in quick enough or in the right order. Sometimes, I feel like I just get really lucky. Or I'm just rushing it and not planning out my plays well enough. Either way. I think I will put magic away for a bit and try again later. I'm pretty tired.

Oh! My local comic store has a piece of theirs of super girl. I love it
Its not a statue. Its a print. The store is called 4th Wall Comics in Lancaster PA. They are big in magic the gathering too

Same. Like the the first 4 are common then you get an ucommon. Then after 4 uncommons you get a rare. And after 4 rares you get a Mythic.

WRITING.TITLE: Izzet Counter Update
WRITING.TEXT: So I have been building the "ultimate" Izzet Standard deck by adding certain counter spells. And I discovered a charming card from M21 called Lofty Denial. It's a 1U that counters any spell unless the opponent taps 1 but if you control a flyer they need to tap 4. It works well for early in the game and if it's late in the game they are casting big spells and probably won't have 4 to spare. Also, I had an issue with Lava Coil. 1R to deal 4 damage to a creature and exile it is appealing but it's very limiting to creatures and left me defenseless against Planeswalkers. So I substituted it with slaying fire and it has been doing so much better for me!
That is an amazing idea!
Perhaps. But I got a real good buzz when I denied an Ugin.
This and stories like Dan from the Game Grumps inspire me to keep going and that it's never to late to be succusessful doing what you love.
Yeah i have 3 1cmc flash flyers in there. Works good for chump blocking in a pinch or if I #8217;m in desperate need for an extra draw

Well no. But it #8217;s hard seeing someone shit on a game you loved growing up because you know they didn #8217;t put the time in to understand its nuances. When game grumps first started they went through a bunch of Games they knew front to back and were really good at so that they could focus on the commentary and comedy. But not understanding a game and them blaming the game for his mistakes just gets really old after a while.

Take ocarina of time for example. The clam situation. While hilarious. Is really not that hard. Arin Never uses his shield because he thinks hes playing A Link to the Past. Which is why he also uses his hookshot for everything. Where Deku Nuts, a new item, is actually a really helpful tool for a lot of situations that Arin never bothered to learn because he just got angry that it wasnt link to the past.

I understand where youre coming from. To be fair especially lately. Covid has a pretty hard on everyone and they are taking it very seriously. I do get dry spells from them now and then where they get into a series i dont care about or the jokes/stories just arent there. But eventually that will change. Like in their Megaman 11 playthrough where Dan talks about performing on Conan. And recently some gems came from their sonic Heroes ep 15. Names Arin screaming #8220;why do you warch game grumps. Stop it #8221; and Dan inventing the hip young phrase #8220;beefy tea #8221; My girlfriend and I both watch them regularly (thank god i found someone who also likes Game Grumps) and those were our favorite bits lately. Doing episodes apart lately feels weird. Because before Arin would freak out and you get Dans reaction to it but lately Dan either cant react in time or its lost in the tiny box on his screen.
That was amazing to watch!

That makes sense. Idk it just seemed weird to me that every time I made a change to my deck I would get terrible hands with doubles of cards that would result from a poorly shuffled deck, if it worked like a paper deck would. Idk. I am sleep deprived. I'm watching community now
Well. I mean I'm trying to get to gold. I just can't get out of silver. But yeah. Not played ranked is better for my psyche

To be fair the world of avatar (do they have a name of the collective land?) Probably doesn't have political correctness. And Toph already established that she doesn't want to be treated special because of her blindness. So I'm not saying it's okay but teasing her blindness isnt really gasp worthy. Honestly I never even thought about it as a kid or as an adult rewatching the show. Even the characters often forget that Toph is blind.

First of all. I did say the whole shuffle thing was just my theory. Idk how programming works. In thinking when you edit a deck the list of numbers your deck is in goes back to 1-2-3-4 and so on and then the game after that. After one algorithmic shuffle would be like 52-53-2-3-7-8 and just getting clumps of cards together. Idk man. If there was some Nigerian witch doctor who could give me the perfecr shuffled deck I would gladly drink a mixture of newt sweat and blue spotted shrooms to make that work.
That it is
Simply wow
Holy crap is that a #8220;classic #8221; bit now? I feel old
These pages are blank. Why am I lying to you?
I think what is funnier but Make Happy is deeper.
I saved what. onto my iPod and it was the only thing I would listen to for MONTHS

I discovered him on youtube. I forget how, he probably just popped up in my recomendations. But I loved his stuff so much! But then years later when Make Happy comes out, my brother tells me about this "amazing introspective deep comedy show" and I'm like. Yeah... I know... I love Bo. And then we talked about Bo for the next 4 years.
I tried showing my Dad Bo's stuff. He only really liked "Bo Oh My God" And doesn't really get the rest of his show. It disappoints me that we can't bond over deep introspective material like that.
Woah! That's how I started too
I loved "Halfway There" personally.

I laugh the hardest during what. But I think Make Happy is dripping with deep introspection. Every single choice he makes, show he performs, is done with a purpose. He also seems a LOT more confident in his porformance than he was in what. Kinda having a more "fuck you, you paid to be here" additude. But what. is still so classic to me and has my gust busting everytime I listen to it. Even though it's less refined it's still genius. I haven't dove deep into Words Words Words but from what I can tell he saved all the deep stuff for the last song Art is Dead which, yeah, it's a damn good song. But imagine a whole special that's like that.
I think the "no homo" joke went over a lot of people's heads. Mine including. I didn't get it until my like 30th listen.

WRITING.TITLE: Weis Points (From a sales associate)
WRITING.TEXT: Okay. So previously, you had to "swipe" your weis card to get your points. But swiping doesn't work anymore and will actually mess up the sale. The only way to get your points is to scan the bar code. But the instructions that are posted on the gas pumps are outdated and still say to swipe the card. After that though, the screen that says "do you want to use your X points? Yes / No" People don't realize that the "Yes" and "No" button correspond to the white buttons next to the screen. They try to hit the buttons on the keypad, which do nothing. Needless to say I get a LOT of angry weis customers who aren't able to get their points for one of those two main reasons. I wish they would update the on screen / written instructions to reflect to new Wies procedures. Or program the pinpad buttons to work with the yes/no option. But no matter how many times I mention it to my managers, they never pass the word on to higher ups. When I have the time or an extra person at register, I will go out there and show the customer step by step the right procedure. But I don't always have the time or availability to do that. Please, just update the instructions.

Jeeze. I have a lot of favorites. I used to get a chicken salad sandwhich with honey musterd on Chibata but they got rid of Chibata (whyyyyy) I love their... I forget what the recipe was called but it's turkey on flatbread, guac, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes. And it's so good. chicken tenders with dr pepper sauce and ranch. I used to love the burger that had doritos on it before they got rid of doritos in the kitchen. I will still order it and put the doritos on myself. :P (Funny, our screens in the office still have the picture of that burger on the desktop wallpaper.)

WRITING.TITLE: Credit/Debit procedure rant
WRITING.TEXT: From a sales associate. I've worked at sheetz for 3-4 years now and before, when a customer used a credit/debit card, it would tell them if it went through before taking their card out. But now, they take their card out, I hit the accept button and wait, and THEN it says if it went through or not. More times then not, the customer is already out the door before I get the confirmation that the card worked. And on very rare occassions but definitely more often than I'm comfortable with. The customer leaves, and it tells me 1. their pin was wrong, 2. their card didn't pay for the whole total, or 3. it just straight up failed. 1. How do you not know your pin. 2. Why do cards allow the sale to go through without being able to pay for the whole sale? 3. Why are you allowed to take your card out before telling the customer if the sale went through or not? Then, when a customer starts to leave and I yell at them to come back because the register isn't finished processing, and it goes through, then I just look like an jerk. This new card procedure didn't start until like 6 months ago. Why did it change? Can we change it back?
On the left side of the room theres a wall you can either bomb or blast away and you get the grip from this. The room to the left is your ship where you can save
I mean. This is my personal best. Not the fastest ever. I can #8217;t see how anyone can beat the game in under an hour without utilizing a cheat to get the power bombs first
100% has never dropped below an hour but any % speedruns are like 30-33 minutes

Like. I learned that I can get everything in Ridley before the Space Pirates. But theres a missle in Kraid that i can only get with the gravity suit. Theres things in Norfair i can only get with gravity suit and theres things in brinstar / crateria that I can only get with Power Bombs.

WRITING.TITLE: Games that aged well
WRITING.TEXT: Personally I feel Super, Zero Mission, Fusion, and the Prime Trilogy hold up really well even today. But i have a hard time revisiting The Samus Returns remake. Idk. 3DS feels really dated to me for some reason. And there #8217;s like this lighting bloom over everything that gives everything a hazy fuzzy look like when I #8217;m not wearing my glasses at night. Also the controls don #8217;t feel as tight as it does in Zero Mission. Personally I feel AM2R did a much better job updating the Metroid 2 experience.
That's a good point. -.- sorry. I will repost this in more suitable supreddit. Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: Question about sleeving and deck-management
WRITING.TEXT: Sleeving: I just picked up a pack of Dragon Shield pefect fit resealable and OMG I love them! But I don't want to double sleeve every single card in every single deck. Is it okay to just double sleeve the most expensive cards like Omniscience and Embercleave? Deck Management: How do you managing decks that share multiple cards like duel-lands, mana-rocks, and just decks with similar themes? I can buy multiple copies of commons and uncommons but getting into Rares and Mythics buying multiples to fit every deck gets pretty expensive! I want to take care of my cards but I also have a budget!

Thank you all for the advive. It's my understanding that it's pretty much all or nothing when double sleeving. It's not quite in my budget to double sleeve all my decks. Even single sleeving is getting a little tight. I either use Ultra Pro eclipse or Dragon Shields. It's best to buy 3 of a kind since 300 sleeves can sleeve either 5 - 60 card decks / 4 - 75 card decks or / 3 - 100 card decks. leaving very little behind. Black is too plain for me to use for all my decks. A darker purple is more my style and both Dragon Shield and Eclipse have a pleasant purple color.
Yeah, I just double sleeved 2 cards in my most played standard deck and it is painfully obvious which ones are double sleeved. I'll work on sleeving the rest of them now.

I #8217;ve thought about doing that. Having a card with the deck list on it. Do you use an index cards cut in half? Maybe i can invest in perfect fits that aren #8217;t resealable. I think those are only 4-5$ a pack instead of 8-9$
My friend who is watching this for the first time picked up immediately that that was Ui and not Yui

Ive thought about this. If I do. It will be Dragon Shields Night Blue. They were my first and still favorite sleeves. But ive also been loving the Ultra Pro eclipse. It would definitely help when switching duel lands around.

WRITING.TITLE: Paying off a charge with interest
WRITING.TEXT: So I have a charge that says "will not incrue interest if paid off by Oct 2020" or something like that. And I have been making payments monthly but the charge with the interest on it does not go down. How do I make this a priority so the interest charge is paid off first and then all the other charges on my account?
I understand that. But i don #8217;t understand why what I #8217;m paying back isn #8217;t going to the charge with interest on it.

WRITING.TITLE: I love this show. But
WRITING.TEXT: Now hear me out. I #8217;ve watched this show through twice now and in the middle of a third viewing. But a few things have started to bug me. Every time sea hawk says adventure. Or sings. Anytime anyone says #8220;first ones #8221; or #8220;first ones tech #8221; I mean. I get it. But they say it way too often for my liking How many times She Ras powers randomly decide to not work. Also. I dont think her powers were ever really addressed. Which im totally fine with. Im cool learning things through seeing them in action. Not everything needs and expo dump or a flashback. But maybe. What are she ras limitations. They set up Bows and Glimmers limitations well. I think thats it. Nitpicks mostly. Just wanted to address them.

I could see that in a way A Link to the Past was kind of a reimagining of the original Zelda. The 8-bit era had a lot of limitations to work around, but the super nintendo opened up a lot of possibility, so I am sure they wanted to perfect their ideas from the 1st generation with fewer limitations but also adding to the story they already set up. Making it a sequel would possibly direct people to the sourse and making the original Metroid and Zelda relevent still.

Personally, I've loved every classic art sleeve I bought. I mistakingly got 3 sets of the Valentine version (the one with the dragon presenting a heart) and also one with a dragon flying over a field and love them both! They have the best shuffle feel and the artwork is really well done. I've got sets of matte sleeves as well and... those left a sour taste in my mouth. One was a holiday special with a dragon peering into a window. Those were so curved that they permanently warped the commander deck I sleeved with them. And the other, the 2020 valentine special, had a constant gluey smell that I never smelled before. So personally... I would go with classic art sleeves. I'm also considering only getting classic sleeves from now on. I've been having mixed to worse experiences with the matte sleeves I pick up but I picked up a classic blue pack and it's my new favorite!
Kind of reminds me of the Tallon Overworld theme in Metroid Prime. Just coincidentally. They both have the same main theme and are like synthy atmospheric. Good job on this!

WRITING.TITLE: Teysa Karlov paraphrasing Thor?
WRITING.TEXT: I can't help but notice that the flavor text on Mana Confluence for the Commander Legends set reads "Ravnica is not its buildings or its markets or even its guilds. Ravnica is its people..." And I can't help but notice that this is very similar to what Thor says at the end of Ragnarok. (I put this spoiler tag because this is technically a spoiler for an upoming set.)
Omg I need this

WRITING.TITLE: Blitz of the Thunder Raptor vs Beacon Bolt
WRITING.TEXT: Blitz is essentially just a better Beacon Bolt. Where Beacon Bolt was a 1UR that dealt X damage to target creature for each instant an sorcery in your graveyard/exile, Blitz is a 1R that does X damage to target Creature OR planeswalker for each instant and sorcery in your graveyard, then if it dies, it gets exiled. Like.. Blitz is infinantly better than beacon bolt. It costs 1 less, can target planeswalkers and can exile it. Is this too much power for its cost? For 1R you typically see "Does 3 damage and scry" or "does 3 damage but if you paid RRR it does 4" or "Does 3 damage and exile target" but having it do X damage, AND exiling AND targeting planeswalkers it just feels like too much for a 1R card.

WRITING.TITLE: Ikoria Ability Counters
WRITING.TEXT: Not sure if Ability counters will make a return but they are certainly a thing now. I don't really care for the cardboard ones that come in packs and I want to use colored pebbles to represent them. I'm thinking like Black = death touch yellow = hexproof dark red = menace green = reach dark green - trample white = lifelink Light blue = flying Blue = 1+1 light green = vigilance clear = First Strike I want this for chrystline Giant where you put a counter on it randomly and I'm going to put 1 of each in a bag and just grab something. Or, if there is a company out there that is making higher quality ability counters, I would totally snatch those up! Thoughts?

That's a good point. I totally forgot about Jump-Start when evaluating the cards. And you are likely to play both later in the game when you have a bunch of cards in the graveyard so is that 1 mana difference really that big of an advantage. Flavorwise, if I'm playing izzet I would totally spring for Beacon Bolt where a Blitz would be more suited towards a mono red that plays a lot of instants/sorceries. Here's a question. When you have a creature with an adventure in your graveyard, do you count that towards the instant/sorcery cost?

WRITING.TITLE: Increasing disappointment with Dragon Shield / sleeve burnout
WRITING.TEXT: My first and favorite sleeves where the night blue. I bought them for my Izzet commander deck and, while I disliked how thick it made my deck, I got used to shuffling it (half a deck at a time) and I still use them for my casual izzet deck. But, I have been buying packs of different colors that either shuffle very poorly, are super slippery, or are painfully transparent in the back. I bought a pack of tangerines today, I put a card in backwards and I could clearly read the card. I love the colors selection. I love that the front is 100% transparent. but I hate dropping $11 on a pack of sleeves and having it be poor quality. Pink, Yellow, Magenta, Blue was completely opaque but had a poor shuffle feel. The problem is, all of my LGSs sell dragon shields (and most are mattes only) Actually, the last pack of sleeves I bought that I liked were. Well, the Olives were really good. I want more of those. And the classic blues were good too. Maybe I should just get classics instead of Matte. But most of my LGSs only carry Mattes. I feel I would have better luck with Utra Pro Eclipses where I have been consistantly getting sleeves with consistantly smooth shuffle feel and all the colors are %100 opaque. I even liked the set of art sleeves I bought a while for a draft. They were sticky but I like that my 100 card commander deck isn't sliding around when I'm trying to play. I don't know. I just feel burnt out on buying sleeves and ending up not liking them. Actually, I'm burnt out on sleeves in general. I spend so much time and money on sleeving cards. They aren't even that valuable. The deck I play the most is $30 at the most, even with the guild kit lands and Promo variants of Sprite Dragon. I have 2 $10 Battle Decks that I sleeved with $11 dragon shields. And the rest of the 40 sleeves go unused. What's the point. I honestly like cards that have some wear. They are loved and played. I never put a case on my phone. I have the way cases make my phone feels. And now, I'm not liking how sleeves make my cards feel. I can switch all my dragon shields to eclipses but that'll be like a $60-$90 sink if they are all the same color. Which color would I pick? make them all purple. Can I even find an LGS with 9 packs of Purple Eclipses? Should I just buy them online? What if my package gets lost in the mail again? that's another $90 I put into sleeves that went to waste. I need a break.
Using inners make the decks even thicker. I don't know. The way I play sleeving might just not be worth it unless it's like my favorite Izzet deck.
I definitely agree with you on the therapist bit Idk, I hear so much online how playing with unsleeved cards is sacrilegious and players that double sleeve even their jankiest decks.

Haha thanks :3 yeah I'm surprised that veil of summer an uncommon in M20 is above $5.00 now. I've had the idea of just sleeving decks I'm currently playing. Like the top 5 or whatever and putting the rest away. There's no need to bring 20+ decks to every event I go to, right? Plus. With dragon Shields I noticed that take some time to wear in, like a new pair of shoes. But once they do, they are amazing. I'd prefer Dragon Shield with 60-75 card decks. But that's just too think for commander for me. I find Eclipses to be a much more pleasant experience.

WRITING.TITLE: Okay... why is everyone freaking out over TWD
WRITING.TEXT: Like. okay, if you don't like the cards, don't buy them. And if you are in a play group, establish that you will not play against decks that contain those cards. You don't need a rules committee to ban cards. Self-regulate. It's a casual communal format. There are houserules all the time. It's really not THAT big of a deal. I hear people saying that Wizards is dead to them and that they are personally insulted that this product exists. Don't like it. Don't buy it. Why get so heated about it.
Because it is. Working at a gas station I see this constantly

Animation =/= anime. Animes are defined by being produced in Japan by japanese artists. She ra is american. Cartoon is underplaying it's impact though. We need a new word to animated series with a plot. Cartoons typically refer to shorter length stories that begin and end in the span of the episode. Stuff like Fairly Odd parents, Tom and Jerry, Spongebob. Those are cartoons. Maybe animated series should be the term. She ra is an animated series.
That's interesting. With this knowledge though, it depends on what language your speaking then. English - Cartoon. Japanese - Anime.

This is very good advice. I have a really hard time when people hassle me about stuff. Like to the point where I get really bad panic attacks at work. I'm better now that my managers have me doing trash and kitchen more often. But I used to be stuck at register the entire time. And dealing with people 40 hours a week straight will get to me. The biggest triggers, denying alcohol purchases, complaining to me when complaints should be towards a manager. Asking me questions I can't possibly know the answer to.
I get this all the time. "the other store lets me do this". Well. They shouldn't have. We have policies and if someone is going against them, that's a problem.

I love the light world but the dark world is what bums me out. I hate constantly taking damage by exploring the world. It makes me not want to explore and constantly has me on edge. Don't get me wrong. It's a fantastic atmosphere it you want a more horror experience. Some of the best scares came from metroid games. But that's not why I play a metroid game.
If you do. Find someone who won't pressure you into it or is okay with not having sex if you say no. Remember it's okay to say no and if they are not okay with that. Bail.

WRITING.TITLE: Big Mama Bear (good ending)
WRITING.TEXT: I was working register at a gas station. A mother had sent her kid in with 5 dollars to get a bottle of soda. He buys the soda, I give him his change. No big deal. Kids come in to buy their own stuff all the time. I actually find it really charming when kids are independent like that. Anyway. A few minutes later he comes back in. He walks around the store. Gets to my register with bottle in hand. And he says something. I'm not sure what. I think he's trying to get another bottle of soda. So I ring him out again. Give him his change. And he's on his way. But he takes the bottle. And puts it back in the fridge. Then it hits me. He was trying to return the original bottle he got. I just sold the kid 2 bottles of soda and he's walking out empty handed. I know I'm in trouble now. Sure enough. About two minutes later. In walks Mama Bear. I see her. Immediately know why she's coming in and why she's mad. And I have to act quick to tell her I'm sorry. I didn't understand the situation. I can fix it. I refund the two bottles of soda and give her her change back. And all was right with the world. But that moment of "Aw crap, here it comes" will always stick with me. Haha.

WRITING.TITLE: Opinions on Lumity and the show moving forward.
WRITING.TEXT: I just wanted to say that I'm really glad that this show isn't treating Lumity as a gay crush. It's just a crush. Going forward I want them to keep this mentality. I'm tired of the coming out scene, the inner monologues of denial. Stuff like that. It's been done to death in media and we need to move away from it. If it's going to be normalized in western media then treat it like any other relationship. Which they have been.

WRITING.TITLE: Dealing with Cramps
WRITING.TEXT: I've been playing drums for 10 years now and I had never got a cramp in my forearm like I did tonight. There could have been many reasons why it happened but I just want to ask if there's ways to prevent future cramps or help dealing with them when they happen.

WRITING.TITLE: So many decks! Deck boxes?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just curious how y'all manage your decks. Right now I have them in 3 long boxes and a couple of Ultimate Guarded boulders. But I would really like them to be in individual boxes. I'm worried about price though. Even the cheap ones will add up with all the decks I have. How do y'all keep your decks?

Weird thing about satin towers. I hate the sound of dice rattling in those boxes. Idk why but it just makes me cringe. Their expensive but I absolutely LOVE the Sidewinder. I can fit a commander deck Or a modern deck with some dice and it fits perfectly.
